name: Er-Spectro
description:
Defeat 7 bosses in this radial Shoot 'em up game to obtain full power of color spectre and defeat hidden evil.

Features

- Good game for killing some time
- 7 different bosses
- 3 different enemies
- Each defeated boss gives you new ability
- One health bar for the whole game. Can you beat it?
- Highscore table
